cont.entity_a: Good value for the price with well-built, well-designed, and flawless performance.
Browsing is enhanced by customizable button commands.
The mouse is small, fitting small hands well, but may be too small for larger hands. Compact size is ideal for travel, but the cord is short for desktop use.
cont.entity_b: Symmetrical design is preferred over fancy shapes.

cont.entity_a: After 14 months, the wheel stopped working. Some users experienced durability issues with the cord fraying.
Amazon customer service suggested contacting Microsoft for support.
The mouse is not ergonomic for larger hands, requiring awkward hand positioning.
cont.entity_b: Comfortable design with lots of options, even for Mac users. Plastic lower side could be improved with cushioned material.

cont.entity_a: Corded design avoids battery issues common with wireless mice. Blue LED light adds a nice design touch.
The scroll wheel is smooth, which some users may find unsatisfactory.
cont.entity_b: Scroll wheel is accurate on almost any surface.

cont.entity_a: Installation is easy with software available online.
Not suitable for gaming due to issues with the middle scroll function.
cont.entity_b: Media buttons enhance gaming and relaxation experiences.

cont.entity_a: The mouse is precise with no noticeable lag.
cont.entity_b: Performance is fantastic with strong signal strength.

cont.entity_a: Rubberized coating can degrade over time with heavy use.

cont.entity_b: Recharable batteries last about 3 months with 8-hour daily use. Good battery life with NiMH rechargeables. Long battery life and range make it a good portable mouse.
Occasional issues on wooden patterned surfaces, resolved by using a paper mouse pad.
Some software compatibility issues with certain media programs.
Some users experience cursor jumping issues, resolved with a driver update. Some users experience issues with erratic mouse behavior and volume control.
Not suitable for left-handed users as it lacks support for left-hand capabilities.
